Player History
Earned first career win on 4/3/1966...
Injured on 7/10/1966 with a Spasms Back, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/6/1972 to a 3-year deal worth $450,000 per year...
Released by Atlanta on 4/1/1972...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 4/29/1972 to a 1-year deal worth $680,000 per year...
Released by Cincinnati on 7/15/1972...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1979, off Bill Dillman (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/1979, off Bill Dillman (ATL)...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/23/1980 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 8/16/1982 with a Fractured Hip, out for 5 weeks...
